---
name: Change Request
about: Create a change record (ITIL-style)
title: "[CHANGE] "
labels: ["change"]
---

## Change description
What are we changing?

## Reason / Business justification
Why now?

## Risk assessment
Dependencies, blast radius, failure modes.

## Implementation plan
Step-by-step.

## Validation plan
How will we confirm success?

## Rollback plan
How do we safely revert?

## Communications
Who needs to know, when, and via what channel?
